text: Ashe, ba ka ga waɗanda suka yi munãfinci ba, sunã cẽwa ga 'yan'uwansu, waɗanda suka kãfirta daga Mazõwa Littafi, "Lalle idan an fitar da ku, lalle zã mu fita tãre da ku, kuma bã zã mu yi ɗã'a ga kõwa ba game da ku, har abada, kuma lalle idan an yãƙe ku, lalle zã mu taimake ku haƙĩƙatan?" Alhãli kuwa Allah na shaidar cẽwa lalle sũ tabbas, maƙaryata ne.
